Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Small and cosy place to have good beer and snacks. They also have days were can also get dinner too, but, as much as I understood,  in the days where no dinner is offered, they are fine if you bring or order your own food around. Beer ‚Ä¶

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: The staff and the owner are amazing! They are smiling and helpful, they can accommodate your preferences. One of my fave bars in A'dam! The staff is lovely and the beer is delicious. A must drink is the Blossom Blond beer! Found this little ‚Ä¶

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Gebrouwen door vrouwen translates to "brewed by women," but in Dutch it rhymes nicely. While they brew their specialty beers in Haarlem, this is their main bar in Amsterdam. It's a fun, quirky place run by friendly, local ladies. It's a great spot with seating outside and lots of sunshine in the evening. The beer is great.

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Tasty beersüç∫ we really liked the beer and the variety this bar provided. The bar has a nice vibe, friendly staff and great location. Totally recommand it!

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Quite a nice place for that beer craving. Variety of beers for different tastes, lining towards girls‚Äô taste. There‚Äôs some options for meals and snacks to complement. Just missing some taco options. For more experiences like this, follow @quiquinnv

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text:
Great Bar!
Nice beers and good snacks!
Joske best bartender ever! Great service good taste of musicüçªüé∂

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: I visited this bar at the opening day. Nice, cosy interior and quite good vibe! Good selection of their special beers (Strawberry Blond is pretty good blond ale! Zonnig Zeewit is good for sunny warm days. They have Heineken too. ;-)

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Decent craft beer and the usual bar snacks, but service was slow. Could of course be that they have fewer staff due to pandemic, but then again there were only a few tables available (as per restrictions).

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Went to this place for their 1st birthday. Lively fun atmosphere, with great music, fantastic beer and all round lovely positive vibes!

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Very nice new cafe with beers on tap. Friendly young owners. Also small snackscan be ordered.

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Dirty fries worth try! And 4 of 4 beers we tried were great

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Nice concept bar with their own beer (brewed by women)! Good beers and suprisingly good food. Limited selection of small portions but everything we‚Äôve tried were good.

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Love this place. Tasty beers, vegan bitterballen, amazing vibe, cool staff, great location, what more can you ask for? Go vrouwen, go!

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Great bar, had the fries as a snack which come with a cute mayo. Some very different beers I would recommend you try one of each.

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: The beers here do not disappoint! Chill and cozy atmosphere, great place to go to catch up with friends!

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Great Bar with a great variety of beers. Real ginger beer! Blossom blonde. White beer with gin. Fantastic.

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Nice clean modern neighborhood bar. They serve their own craft beer and small bar bites.

Name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen
Review Text: Nice bar with good service, original snacks and of course great beers!

Review Text: Lovely little brew pub with sone very interesting beer flavours. Loved the Ginger wheat beer.
